description:
This course is designed to teach you the core skills that you will need to master blogging on the social web in a digital world.

Why can I help you achieve a lifestyle business built on a online platform.

Since launching my blog 6 years ago with only a $10 investment in my domain name, I learnt the art and science of attracting traffic without paying Google and Facebook a cent, I also perfected the skills for creating content that went viral and built global credibility and trust.

Along the way I collected a loyal and passionate tribe of nearly 400,000 Twitter followers.

The last step was to turn that traffic, trust and engagement into leads and sales. Today I travel the world speaking and have a lifestyle business that gives me freedom and financial independence.

I have had nearly 20 million visitors since launching and today my blog receives over 5 million views a year.

I will reveal how achieve to blogging success based on real life and business lessons from years of blood sweat and tears.

This course shows you how to build a digital platform that can take you to new heights of creativity, global engagement and business opportunity.

We will also show you how to create an online business from your knowledge from your own blog.

You will learn how to share your story with the world in a way that will build trust and credibility.

It's your time to share your knowledge with a world that needs your inspiration.
title: 7 Key Steps to Blogging Mastery
